title: Be Safe
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Puppet films
description: Episode of Series "Learn with Sooty". Learn with Sooty videos have been developed to make learning fun. Sooty, Sweep and Soo, along with Mathew Corbett, give valuable guidance as they explore and learn about important safety issues. Be safe looks at how to avoid common dangers such as carelessness scalding, misuse of medicine, burning, road safety and talking to strangers. This video will help young children learn at their own individual pace in a way that is both meaningful and enjoyable. It is especially important that parents should watch this video with their children and discuss the many safety issues which it raises.
related_objects: Series; S00965; Learn with Sooty; Active; 1989
